attributes.action: Ban Vitaly Milonov from entering the UK for his roll in LGBT discrimination in Russia and the Winter Games.
attributes.additional_details:
Vitaly Milonov has taken the strongest stance not only against the LGBT community in his own country but now to those from other countries at the forthcoming Winter Games.

Vitaly Milonov is clearly set on forcing LGBT individuals from his own country and should be prevented from entering British Territories to do the same.
